name: Beam Report
query:
SELECT
`tabWages Entry`.beam as "Beam ID:Link/Beam Detail Entry:150",
`tabWages Entry`.item as "Item:Link/Item:100",
`tabWages Entry`.machine as "Machine:Link/Machine:80",
`tabWages Entry`.beam_no as "Beam No::50",
`tabWages Entry`.name as "Taka ID:Link/Wages Entry:100",
`tabWages Entry`.taka_mtr as "Taka Meter:Float:100",
`tabWages Entry`.short as "Shortage:Float:100"

FROM `tabWages Entry`
WHERE beam=%(name)s
